about_the_game:
◆ Story

After the male protagonist, Zhang Jun, fell out of love, he drank with his friend Azhe in a bar. Azhe recommended him to buy the latest technology, AI girlfriend. Looking at Azhe's pale face from overindulging in sex, Zhang Jun, who originally had no interest in AI, couldn't help but feel curious. He clicked on the shopping website with the intention of trying it out.

Unexpectedly, the ordering process was quite difficult. Because he didn’t know how the keywords worked, he either generated a chimera or an alien at first. After some trials and errors, he finally generated a human-like one. He was already very tired and just clicked on the buttons randomly for the personality parts before placing the order.

Early on in the next morning, Zhang Jun was woken up by the doorbell. His AI girlfriend had arrived. It was an unexpected product. The trial period was 30 days, could Zhang Jun successfully complete the 30 days with this product?

◆ Gameplay instructions

There are several choices in the main story, and each choice will affect the final ending.

As the story develops, more interactive options will gradually be unlocked, from [chat] with Momo, her [change] her clothes, to [recharge] her, etc. Your relationship may become closer and closer, or you may not get along. Choose your actions carefully, and work hard to improve your [compatibility] with her!

In addition to cultivating a relationship with Momo, players can also go to the AI ​​brothel to hire prostitutes. As long as you choose the right number of drinks to buy, you can have sex with a super attractive AI mechanical prostitute! Work hard to make money to buy drinks!

◆ Game features

◇ 16 full-motion HCG, 10 basic CG

◇ Rich game text : ca. 80,000 words

◇ Three main female characters

◇ A casual simulation game that is relaxing and fun

◇ Game ending: 3 types (Refund, damage, happy endings)

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, General Mature Content or BDSM.
All characters are over the age of 20.

After the male protagonist, Zhang Jun, fell out of love, he drank with his friend Azhe in a bar. Azhe recommended him to buy the latest technology, AI girlfriend. Looking at Azhe's pale face from overindulging in sex, Zhang Jun, who originally had no interest in AI, couldn't help but feel curious. He clicked on the shopping website with the intention of trying it out.

Unexpectedly, the ordering process was quite difficult. Because he didn’t know how the keywords worked, he either generated a chimera or an alien at first. After some trials and errors, he finally generated a human-like one. He was already very tired and just clicked on the buttons randomly for the personality parts before placing the order.

Early on in the next morning, Zhang Jun was woken up by the doorbell. His AI girlfriend had arrived. It was an unexpected product. The trial period was 30 days, could Zhang Jun successfully complete the 30 days with this product?

name: My AI Girlfriend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This...this fierce-looking chav girl is supposed to be my AI girlfriend? What! Housework module required a top-up? Cooking mod and sex mod too?! Although the AI girlfriend was a product of capitalism, it was not without its benefits. As for what benefits it was, you could only find out in the game~
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
